properties.areaDesc: Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to Stonington, ME
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 14 at 9:46AM EST until February 14 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Caribou ME
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, north winds 15 to 20 kt
with gusts up to 30 kt and seas 2 to 4 feet. For the Freezing
Spray Advisory, moderate accumulation of freezing spray.

* WHERE...Intra Coastal Waters from Schoodic Point, ME to
Stonington, ME.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 11 PM EST this
evening. For the Freezing Spray Advisory, until 7 AM EST
Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Operating a vessel in freezing spray is hazardous.
Freezing spray may render mechanical and electronic components
inoperative. Ice accretion on decks and superstructures may
result in some loss of stability. Conditions will be hazardous
to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should prepare for accumulation of ice on their vessel
and consider altering plans to avoid or mitigate these hazardous
navigating conditions.

Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM EST THIS EVENING... ...FREEZING SPRAY ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST SATURDAY
